SELECT ord.* , le.emp_mobile as emp_mobile, le.emp_name as emp_name, le.emp_cover as emp_cover,
les.emp_mobile as emp_mobile_seller, les.emp_name as emp_name_seller, les.emp_cover as emp_cover_seller,
lg.cloud_caoping_title as cloud_caoping_title, lg.cloud_caoping_pic as cloud_caoping_pic, lg.cloud_caoping_address as cloud_caoping_address, lg.cloud_caoping_prices as cloud_caoping_prices, lpro.pname as provinceName, lcity.cityName as cityName, larea.areaName as areaName
from PAOPAO_SHOPPING_ORDER ord LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON ord.emp_id=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN lx_emp les ON ord.seller_emp_id=les.emp_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping lg ON ord.cloud_caoping_id=lg.cloud_caoping_id LEFT JOIN province lpro ON lpro.provinceid=ord.PROVINCEID LEFT JOIN city lcity ON lcity.cityid=ord.CITYID LEFT JOIN area larea ON larea.areaid=ord.AREAID WHERE ord.ORDER_NO=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE PAOPAO_SHOPPING_ORDER SET STATUS='5' ,COMPLETION_TIME=#{time}, ACCEPT_TIME=#{time} WHERE #{time}-PAY_TIME >#{period} AND PAY_STATUS='1' AND STATUS = '6'
